website_summaries.verdict: Affordable price point for a portable 3-in-1 bedside commode. We recommend it for travel or camping use because it stores flat and requires no assembly tools.
pros: Easy to assemble, with no tools required
Can be converted to bath chair or elevated toilet seat
Easy to clean and store between uses
cons: Plastic seat is thin, with sharp edges on bottom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: My dad has Alzheimer's. He is physically fit and able to use a regular toilet but night time confusion caused him trouble locating the bathroom. He started going in his room. We bought this commode and liners and have had great success. We have rubber runners across the floor for misses along with a pee pad. It is not because of a lack of quality. He also needs a note above for his peace of mind. There is an assembly video that helps get this assembled quickly. We have not used this over the toilet but if it comes to that I would not mind making another purchase for a second.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased this for an elderly person. It was easy to set up. Person likes the commode. It is stable and ample for a large person 220 lbs. It is easy to clean. Have not purchased liners for that reason. No odors if the lid is in place. No complaints whatsoever. Also the price was right. Some have mentioned trying to fold this commode. From what I can tell it does not fold. It simply comes apart for storage. One great advantage is that the commode can be raised higher without compromising the stability or safety. Due to its lightweight construction, it is possible to carry this around the house to the various rooms.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Now this is one of the better deals around
customer_reviews.text: Now this is one of the better deals around, good value for money. Went camping with it and my wife loved it. Plus it is very handy if needed to use by a person that has difficulty using home toilets. Just put this over the toilet, it is higher because it is adjustable (no bucket in this case) and the arms do assist for challenged persons to sit or get up. Very sturdy unit.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable enough to use as a bedside commode for a sick or disabled person.
customer_reviews.text: Used it as an emergency commode when having repairs done at our house. Fit our needs. A little narrow between the arms if you are not skinny. Also seat edges somewhat sharp. So not the most comfortable. Like the option to fold up and store when not in use.

customer_reviews.title: Godsend

customer_reviews.title: An absolute must have after surgery!!!

This "Adult Potty Chair" is so well built, so sturdy and so comfortable for my wife to use. It sits right by her chair in the living room and right next to her bed at night. Don't buy any other product - this is a great solution for someone who has very limited mobility.

product_meta.title: NOVA Folding Commode, Over Toilet and Bedside Commode, Comes with Splash Guard/Bucket/Lid
product_meta.description: The Folding Commode is so versatile! It quickly folds and unfolds in seconds making it easy for travel or storage. It can be used as a bedside commode or as a toilet safety frame and elevated toilet seat over your existing toilet. The 3-in-1 Foldable Commode can be used as a stand-alone commode over the toilet as a raised toilet and for toilet support rails. It features an adjustable height steel frame and includes a bucket with lid and splash guard. Best of all this commode folds and unfolds in seconds making it ideal for travel and storage.
feature_bullets: VERSATILE FOLDING COMMODE that can be used as a stand-alone toilet commode – by the bed, or over an existing toilet. Comes with splash guard, bucket with handle and lid for both options.

SPECIFICATIONS: Weight capacity - 300 lb.; Product weight: 14.3 lb.; Seat dimension - 13.5” W x 16.25” D; Toilet opening – 8”W x 9.75”D; Seat height adjustment - 16" - 21.75", Width between arms – 17.75", Overall width: 21.75", Overall depth: 21.75”; Folded dimensions (with backrest removed) 22”W x 25” H x 5”D; Bucket volume: 7.5 qt.
ASSEMBLES IN MINUTES with no tools required. The frame, backrest, toilet seat and lid all snap into place. Cannot be used in bath or shower. Fixed arm style
UNFOLDS IN SECONDS for easy storage. Great for portable use and travel. Legs are easy to adjust with push buttons to raise and lower the seat height.
DURABLE STEEL FRAME weighs only 14.3 lb. Easy to clean.
